doc:
Ron Glass https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Glass 0 Ronald Earle Glass (July 10, 1945 – November 25, 2016) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as literary Det. Ron Harris in the television sitcom Barney Miller (1975–82), and as the spiritual Shepherd Derrial Book in the 2002 science-fiction series Firefly and its sequel film Serenity. Ronald_Earle_Glass ( July_10_,_1945 – November_25_,_2016 ) was an_American_actor . He was_known for his_roles as literary_Det._Ron_Harris in the_television_sitcom_Barney_Miller_(_1975 – 82_) , and as the_spiritual_Shepherd_Derrial Book in the_2002_science-fiction_series_Firefly and its_sequel_film_Serenity .
